p: The main findings of this assay are the LC 50 of NiO NPs was 79.83 μg/ml and submaximal concentrations of 80 and 100 μg/ml were selected in this study. Similar results were obtained in previous findings demonstrated a dose dependent reduction of MTT-value in A549 cells treated with NiO NPs [ 10] or with Ni NPs [ 42].
